entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pointe-à-la-Croix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 12:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %

Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to periods of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
